Synopsis TEZPAY 0.0.22-alpha - the tezos reward distributor Copyright © 2022 alis.is
Options -h, --help help for tezpay -l, --log-level string Sets output log format (json/text/auto) (default "info") -o, --output-format string Sets log level format (trace/debug/info/warn/error) (default "auto") -p, --path string Path to bake buddy instance (default ".") --signer string Override signer SEE ALSO tezpay generate-payouts	- generate payouts tezpay pay	- manual payout tezpay statistics	- prints earning stats tezpay test-notify	- notification test tezpay transfer	- transfers tez to specified address tezpay version	- prints tezpay version Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 20-Nov-2022

body:
tezpay pay manual payout
Synopsis runs manual payout
tezpay pay [flags] Options --confirm automatically confirms generated payouts -c, --cycle int cycle to generate payouts for --from-file string loads payouts from file instead of generating on the fly -h, --help help for pay --no-separate-sc disables smart contract separation (mixes txs and smart contract calls within batches) --notificator string Notify through specific notificator --report-to-stdout prints them to stdout (wont write to file) -s, --silent suppresses notifications Options inherited from parent commands -l, --log-level string Sets output log format (json/text/auto) (default "info") -o, --output-format string Sets log level format (trace/debug/info/warn/error) (default "auto") -p, --path string Path to bake buddy instance (default ".") --signer string Override signer SEE ALSO tezpay	- TEZPAY Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 20-Nov-2022
